      static javafx.beans.property.SimpleListProperty<User> allUsers
      All current online users except myUser!
      static User myUser
      MyUser which can't be changed until ConnectivityManager.off() is called and a new UserManager with a new myUser is registered to the network and ConnectivityManager.on() is called.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnonymous

        public T getAnonymous(int hisPID)
        An anonymous user does only have a PID by default and the identifier is null. May overwrite this method to let an not yet identified user have also other predefined attributes.
        Returns:
        Returns a representation of a ghost user.

      • stop

        public void stop()

        Every time NetworkConfig.status is set to NetworkConfig.States.Unbound this method is called synchronously.

        Is called before ParticipantManager is stopped. Therefore the content of ParticipantManager.PARTICIPANTS and ParticipantManager.MY_PID depends on if this application was a network host or client (PARTICIPANTS is maybe empty and MY_PID may contain 0 = not yet identified).

        DON'T EXECUTE LONG RUNNING TASKS HERE, since it blocks the network activity!

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceManager.P2PService

        Every time NetworkConfig.status is set to NetworkConfig.States.BoundToServer this method is called synchronously.

        Specified by:
        start in interface ServiceManager.P2PService

      • receive

        public void receive(RegisteredMessage message)
        Description copied from interface: MessageBus.MessageReceiver
        Is called synchronized if a message was received. Therefore Messages will be received through this method in the same order they were received from the network.
        Specified by:
        receive in interface MessageBus.MessageReceiver
